content: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
We hang the petty thieves and appoint the great ones to public office.
The desire for imaginary benefits often involves the loss of present blessings.
Kindness is more persuasive than force.
Once a wolf, always a wolf.
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly and applying the wrong remedies.
Politics is the gentle art of getting votes from the poor and campaign funds from the rich, by promising to protect each from the other.
A patriot must always be ready to defend his country against his government.
When the President does it, that means that it's not illegal.
Did you hear that we're writing Iraq's new Constitution?Why not just give them ours? We're not using it anymore.
Common sense is like deodorant. The people who need it most never use it.
Disneyland. The world's biggest people trap, built by a mouse.
You can tell how boring a person is by the lack of fear in their eyes when someone is flipping through photos on their phone.
I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
